attributes.action: drop the publish ban on uder age offenders - Name & Shame
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have created a nanny state to include protecting under age offenders,there is no detterent for these yobs that if their caught on cctv or caught vandalisng that because of their age they can`t be named by the press.Its time they were named maybe parents might be ashamed into controlling their offspring.
